reviews.review: Plno hacker≈Ø i na primu, Valve dƒõl√° √∫pln√© hovno. Neztr√°cejte sv≈Øj ƒças touto sraƒçkou. Hod√≠ V√°s to do full russian teamu, kde v√°s teamkilluji a pak vyhod√≠, za co≈æ dostanete penalizaci.....  GG VALVE GG

Very recently there have been numerous cheaters. I love how Valve prioritizes blocking game hooks (which happens to block Game Capture for OBS and other streaming software) but does ABSOLUTELY NOTHING against the inrush of cheaters.

So so many hackers nowadays.  This game has become completely ruined and unenjoyable.  And it seems as if Valve is not doing much against them.  There wont be an evening where there wont be at least 1 spinbotter in a lobby.  You can report as much as you want, months later that same account is still active and doing a 100 bomb.  Yes, 100 kills in a single Comp, with 9 deaths.  And the only reason why he died 9 times is because he allowed us to kill him by standing still.  We reported him weeks ago and lo and behold, he was still there in this evening's game.  This is only one case.  I am not exaggerating when I say we come across at least 1 blatant cheater in an evening of 3 games.  And lots of them have been reported weeks ago already.  Some of them hide it very well, but then you get the blatant rage hackers as we call them that just enable every hack known to mankind and just run through a whole team getting Ace after Ace after Ace.

Valve is set to lose a lot of players due to this, unless this is fixed soon.
